title: [QUESTION] .NET Standard 2.0 Support
body:
Hi,

Just wondering if there are any plans on .NET Standard 2.0 Support in the near future? :)

Cheers,
Adam

comments.author: neodynamic
comments.body: SkiaSharp can be used in .NET Standard 2.0 projects! Not sure what you meant by supporting .NET Standard 2.0...

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: The current support is from .NET Standard 1.3 and above. Can you elaborate a bit more?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Closing this as SkiaSharp is .NET Standard 1.3+ - which means 2.0 is supported.
